name: Able Gardeners
description: Able Gardners is a vocational program at the Pomeroy Center that provides landscaping and groundskeeping services to both residential and commercial customers. Since 1992, the Pomeroy Able Gardeners have been beautifying San Francisco and San Mateo County with their exceptional gardening skills. If you’re looking to clean up your yard or continue maintenance throughout the year, their team is available to help.
